title: Electron band structure in germanium, my ass (2001)
author: tux3
aiHeadline: Scientists finally figure out germanium's electron band structure, and all we get is this underwhelming discovery from 2001? Boring!

title: Bletchley code breaker Betty Webb dies aged 101
author: danso
aiHeadline: Another WWII code-breaking legend bites the dust, leaving the rest of us to wonder if we'll ever live to 101 and still be relevant.

title: Glubux's Powerwall (2016)
author: bentobean
aiHeadline: Glubux's Powerwall: because who doesn't want to relive the glory days of 2016 energy storage tech? Still better than nothing, I guess.

title: Why F#?
author: bozhidar
aiHeadline: Why F#? Because sometimes you just want to write code that no one else can understand, right?

title: CERN scientists find evidence of quantum entanglement in sheep
author: mackopes
aiHeadline: CERN scientists prove that sheep are the ultimate quantum entanglement champions, because who else can pull off that level of confusion?
